content: this cheerful beginner friendly baby blanket is gender neutral and perfect for new crocheters looking to try out a new stitch pattern if you re a visual learner you ll be happy to know that the pattern includes a video tutorial on how crochet this blanket including changing colours **materials ** to make this blanket you will need the following supplies -hobbii amigo xl worsted weight yarn -8 skeins 872 yards primrose -5 skeins 545 yards white -size h-8 5 mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends **measurements ** finished blanket measures 32 wide x 47 long ﻿**skill level ** ﻿beginner
